磍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiá］
［《廣韻》古黠切，入黠，見。］
［《集韻》下瞎切，入舝，匣。］
见“碣2磍”。

磍字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磍； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页834第30
【集韻】【韻會】下瞎切【正韻】胡八切，?音轄。【玉篇】碣磍，搖目吐舌也。盛怒也。【前漢·揚雄·長楊賦】建碣磍之虛。【孟康註】虡刻猛獸，形碣磍而盛怒。　又【廣韻】枯轄切，音趏。剝也。　又【集韻】乙轄切，音呾。磍?，石地不平。?原字从殳，不从刂。

磍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
磍字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiá］
["Guangyun" cut from ancient points, enter the points, see. ]
["Jiyun" blindly cut under the jurisdiction, box. ]
See "Jie 2 磍".
磍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　磍; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 834 30
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Xia Blind Cut [Zheng Yun] Hu eight cut,? Yin administrated. [Jade articles] Jade, shaking his eyes and sticking his tongue out. Rage too. 【Previous Han·Yangxiong·Changyang Fu】The emptiness of Jian Jie. [Mengkang's Note] A beast is carved with a beast, stubborn and angry.　[Guangyun] Withered and cut, sound 趏. Peel also.　 [Ji Yun] Yi Jue cut, sound 呾.磍?, the rocky ground is uneven. ? The original word is from the 殳, not from the 刂.
